metadata.description: 1:1 mapping of ACNH features to Cosmic Colony universe

bells.cosmic_lore: Galactic standard currency used across all inhabited systems

nook_miles.cosmic_lore: Reputation points earned through achievements and exploration milestones

island.cosmic_lore: A small planetoid where your escape pod crash-landed after a catastrophic warp drive failure
island.topdown_implementation: Use Tilemap system or 3D terrain grid. Procedurally generated planetoid with biomes.

rivers.cosmic_lore: Streams of ionized energy that flow across the planet's surface
rivers.topdown_implementation: Environment zones requiring Jet-Jump ability (vaulting pole equivalent) to cross

ponds.cosmic_lore: Concentrated pockets of cosmic energy and stellar matter

cliffs.cosmic_lore: Elevated terrain formed by ancient meteorite impacts
cliffs.topdown_implementation: Multi-level zones using TopDown Engine's level system with Gravity Lifts (ladder equivalent)

trees.cosmic_lore: Bioluminescent alien plant life that produces Energy Orbs instead of fruit
trees.topdown_implementation: Interactable objects with shake mechanic (MMFeedback) that drop loot

beach.cosmic_lore: The outer edge of the planet where cosmic radiation meets the atmosphere
beach.topdown_implementation: Special zone with unique collectibles and landing pad for visitors

resident_services.cosmic_lore: Central hub run by Z.O.E. (Zero-Gravity Operations Entity) AI
resident_services.topdown_implementation: Scene activation for interior, hub for quests and upgrades

nook_cranny.cosmic_lore: Automated trading post that connects to the galactic marketplace
nook_cranny.topdown_implementation: Shop system using TopDown Engine's inventory interface

museum.cosmic_lore: Repository of alien specimens, ancient artifacts, and cosmic art
museum.topdown_implementation: Collection tracking system with display rooms

able_sisters.cosmic_lore: Advanced clothing synthesizer that creates custom spacesuits and attire

airport.cosmic_lore: Quantum teleportation hub for visiting other colonists' planets
airport.topdown_implementation: Multiplayer lobby and scene transition system

fishing_rod.cosmic_lore: Electromagnetic field projector that captures energy-based organisms
fishing_rod.topdown_implementation: Tool component inheriting from Weapon class with casting mechanic

net.cosmic_lore: Creates a temporary time-dilation field to capture mobile specimens
net.topdown_implementation: Melee weapon with capture radius and stasis effect

shovel.cosmic_lore: Multi-purpose excavation tool for digging up artifacts and planting flora
shovel.topdown_implementation: Tool for digging spots and planting, interacts with ground layer

axe.cosmic_lore: High-energy beam tool for harvesting Xeno-Flora resources
axe.topdown_implementation: Melee weapon that damages tree objects, multiple hit levels

watering_can.cosmic_lore: Nutrient mist dispenser that accelerates Xeno-Flora growth
watering_can.topdown_implementation: Tool with area effect on plant objects

slingshot.cosmic_lore: Device that shoots graviton pellets to knock down floating objects

vaulting_pole.cosmic_lore: Anti-gravity propulsion footwear for crossing plasma flows
vaulting_pole.topdown_implementation: Movement ability unlock for crossing environment zones

ladder.cosmic_lore: Personal anti-gravity device for scaling crater plateaus
ladder.topdown_implementation: Ability to access higher terrain levels

fish.cosmic_lore: Energy-based life forms that swim through plasma flows and nebula pools
fish.collection_location: Plasma Flows, Nebula Pools, Cosmic Ocean
fish.topdown_implementation: PickableItem with rarity system, time/location spawning

bugs.cosmic_lore: Small autonomous bio-mechanical entities that inhabit the planet
bugs.topdown_implementation: AI entities with flee behavior, captured with Stasis Field

fossils.cosmic_lore: Remnants of long-dead civilizations and extinct alien species
fossils.topdown_implementation: Hidden items revealed by digging mechanic

sea_creatures.cosmic_lore: Creatures that exist in the deepest plasma trenches
sea_creatures.topdown_implementation: Swimming mechanic with breath system, chase mechanics

tom_nook.cosmic_lore: The AI that saved you from your crashed escape pod... and now bills you for repairs
tom_nook.topdown_implementation: Dialogue system NPC, quest giver, shop keeper

isabelle.cosmic_lore: Z.O.E.'s assistant AI who helps manage daily colony operations
isabelle.topdown_implementation: Daily announcements, island rating system, environmental controls

villagers.cosmic_lore: Aliens from various species seeking refuge on your planet
villagers.topdown_implementation: AI agents with daily routines, dialogue trees, gift system

blathers.cosmic_lore: An eccentric xenobiologist who curates the Galactic Archive
blathers.topdown_implementation: Donation system NPC with lore dialogue for each item

celeste.cosmic_lore: Stellarion's sister, an astronomer who tracks meteor showers and cosmic events
celeste.topdown_implementation: Special event NPC, DIY recipe giver for space-themed items

hardwood.cosmic_lore: Hardened organic strands from ancient Xeno-Flora

softwood.cosmic_lore: Pliable organic material from young Xeno-Flora

stone.cosmic_lore: Basic mineral compound found throughout the planet

iron_nugget.cosmic_lore: Essential metallic element for advanced fabrication

gold_nugget.cosmic_lore: Rare crystallized element highly valued across the galaxy

meteor_shower.cosmic_lore: When nearby asteroid fields pass through, creating spectacular light shows and collectible fragments
meteor_shower.topdown_implementation: Timed event spawning falling star particles, press button to wish

fishing_tourney.cosmic_lore: Competitive event to capture the most Nebula Organisms

bug_off.cosmic_lore: Competition to collect the most Micro-Drones

diy_crafting.cosmic_lore: Using a 3D printer/replicator to construct items from raw materials
diy_crafting.topdown_implementation: Crafting system with recipe unlocks and workbench interaction

custom_designs.cosmic_lore: Programmable holographic designs for surfaces and clothing
custom_designs.topdown_implementation: Texture customization system with grid editor

terraforming.cosmic_lore: Using advanced technology to reshape the planet's terrain
terraforming.topdown_implementation: Tile modification system for creating/destroying terrain

happy_home_designer.cosmic_lore: Personalizing your modular living quarters with furniture and decorations
happy_home_designer.topdown_implementation: Interior decoration system with grid placement
